sellerCard.description: I love WordPress, but I understand that you may not share that same passion. I understand that all you want is your site to work, and work great. And thatâ€™s my job. I make WordPress my business, so you can focus on your business. I want to be the best technical support partner for any individual, business or organization with a WordPress website.

description.content:
Contact me for a professional online course and e-learning WordPress website design!


I can design a WordPress eLearning website for Individuals, startups, large corporations, and everyone in between who wants to reach their students with detailed custom courses.


My All Packages include:

  • Custom WordPress website design
  • LMS system setup and configurations
  • Paments systems integrations
  • Email marketing integrations (Mailchimp/ActiveCampaign)


If you are just establishing your new online course management platform, I will do a thorough e-Learning website design for your needs. Pls, contact me to discuss your project.


Please contact me with your requirements before purchasing this gig.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide a licence for required plugins?
What do you need to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need you to provide me with your WordPress login information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide support after the project is done?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide support for 2 weeks.

reviews.comment: Itâ€™s very easy to work with Yslam and understood exactly what I wanted and I tell her understood more the project than I expected.

We had a difficult project that required many interested parties to be satisfied. Yslam took the time needed to fully understand the project and delivered. Request for changes and added features were quickly answered, researched and applied. Yslam is our go to developer! He would be a tremendous asset to any development team. Yslam receives are highest recommendation!
I needed work done under very tight deadline and he was quick, professional with an excellent output. I will highly recommend
Another job well done. Very easy developer to work with. This is our 2nd project with him.

It's my second project with Yslam, he provides excellent professional service, easy friendly communication, can-do attitude and a lot of patience. I really like the clarity of communication, clean design, innovative ideas and ability to solve problems with creative solutions. Overall, great experience with great results. I highly recommend his services.

notableClients.name: Bosch
notableClients.interaction_description: I collaborated with Bosch to develop a user-friendly intranet website for their dealer network. Utilizing the powerful features of MemberPress, I designed a system that ensured authorized access to sensitive information.

notableClients.name: Volvo CE
notableClients.interaction_description: In collaboration with Volvo CE, I utilized LearnDash and WordPress to create an interactive gamified Learning Management System. This platform was designed to train employees in a fun and engaging way, enhancing their learning experience.

enriched_details.name: Volvo CE
enriched_details.description: Volvo CE (Volvo Construction Equipment) is a major international company that develops, manufactures, and markets equipment for construction and related industries.
